attributes.action: Stop BT charging £125 for line connection for HM Forces Single accomodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BT currently charges Barrack accomodated troops £125 for phone line connection, there are usually BT lines installed in the majority of rooms however, BT insist on charging a  extraordinary amount for the privilege of connecting to their service! I have previously had a BT line connected and was only charged £10! Why the stupid increase!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
